Certainly! Here are some ideas for incorporating avocados and other healthy high-fat foods into your meals:

1. Add avocado slices to a salad or as a topping to a grain or buddha bowl.
2. Use mashed avocado instead of mayonnaise on a sandwich or wrap.
3. Make homemade guacamole with avocado, diced tomatoes, red onions, and lime juice.
4. Include nuts or seeds in a homemade trail mix, smoothie bowl or oatmeal bowl.
5. Top your Greek yogurt with fresh berries, honey, and chopped nuts or seeds for a healthy snack.
6. Cook salmon or other fatty fish with olive oil and herbs for an easy and healthy dinner option.
7. Use olive oil to dress salads or cook vegetables.
8. Add some avocado to your breakfast toast or eggs dish for added creaminess and nutrition.
9. Melt some nut butter over a heated whole grain bread for a high-energy breakfast.
10. Snack on dark chocolate with a handful of nuts, berries, or a small piece of fruit to keep you satisfied throughout the day.

Remember, moderation is the key, so choose a variety of high-fat foods to add to your diet while keeping an eye on portion sizes.
